sentences.english: They depend on glacial melt for irrigation, but the glaciers are doomed.
sentences.chinese: 他们靠着冰川融水灌溉，但冰川本身被宣告了死刑。

sentences.english: Landscape irrigation is an important aspect of reclaimed wastewater reuse.
sentences.chinese: 灌溉绿地是再生水回用的重要途径之一。

sentences.english: The district where the experiment was carried out was the area watered by the Tennessee River in the U. S. A.
sentences.chinese: 进行上述试验的地区正是美国田纳西河所灌溉的地区。

sentences.english: Farm irrigation from these free-flowing bodies is the biggest single human use of freshwater.
sentences.chinese: 自由流通水体的农场灌溉是人们最大的淡水单一使用。

sentences.english: A graywater catchment system could collect reusable water for irrigation and toilet flushing.
sentences.chinese: 废水回收系统可以用来灌溉，也可以用来冲厕所。

sentences.english: These will bring all the nearby farmland udder irrigation.
sentences.chinese: 这些将使附近所有农田都得到灌溉。

sentences.english: compounding that, underpricing means it is often used for watering low-value crops.
sentences.chinese: 地下水的抑价说明其经常被用来灌溉低价值作物。

sentences.english: The optimized irrigation decreases the angle between flag leaf and stem.
sentences.chinese: 优化灌溉处理小麦旗叶茎叶夹角明显减小。

sentences.english: Irrigation is needed to make crops grow in dry regions.
sentences.chinese: 干旱地区需要灌溉才能使作物生长。

sentences.english: It can be used to determine the technical parameters of circular furrow irrigation with small tubes.
sentences.chinese: 应用该模型可以确定小管出流环沟灌溉的技术参数。

sentences.english: The unsaturated irrigation supply has duality in yellow soil.
sentences.chinese: 集中的灌溉补给，在黄土层中形成二元非饱和渗流。

sentences.english: This irrigation project requires a highly developed technical and interpretive expertise.
sentences.chinese: 这项灌溉工程需要高度发展的技术和说明的专门知识。

sentences.english: They have built canals to irrigate the desert.
sentences.chinese: 他们建造成水渠以灌溉沙漠。

sentences.english: The water would be reused to irrigate crops.
sentences.chinese: 回用水可以用来进行农田灌溉。

sentences.english: Water your plants from the opening in the pipe.
sentences.chinese: 从管子的开口处灌溉你的植物。

sentences.english: The ground subsidence was due to collapse of loess soil caused by applying irrigation water.
sentences.chinese: 地表沉陷是由灌溉水的充填引起黄土结构崩塌造成的。

definition: to pilot a ship/to channel water/to draw water (for irrigation)
drip irrigation/to irrigate by drip feed
water source/water supply/headwaters of a river
to clear a wild area for cultivation/to put under the plow
